task.title: Removing a Device from the List
task.shortdesc: This shows how to remove a device from the list.

context.p: Each device in the list has a position index. When a device is removed from the list, any other devices in the list are shifted as required to allow the empty position to be occupied. Removing a device from the list means that the Bluetooth GPS PSY will not try to connect to it next time GPS position information is required.

step.cmd: Call CLbsBtGpsConfig::RemoveDevice(TLbsBtGpsEntryKey). This function takes the unique key of the device being removed from the list.

stepxmp.codeblock: // Remove the device from the list iConfig->RemoveDevice(key);

step.stepresult: This step returns KErrNone upon success.

result.p: The device is removed from the list.

link.linktext: Bluetooth GPS PSY Configuration API Overview
